channel.title: so i was helping my friend clean her computer
channel.description:
she kept complaining about how slow it was running and asked me to take a look. within about 30 seconds i open disk cleanup and see this.
[img]https://img714.imageshack.us/img714/7199/59292081.png[/img]
obviously i'm gonna do other maintenance and stuff, but this just gave me a laugh.

item.title: so i was helping my friend clean her computer
item.dc:creator: kewl
item.description:
Harry-UK:

I once did an AVG virus sweep on a friend’s computer after he complained it was running as slow as shit…he had 750+ viruses and other malware on his PC. What. The. Fuck. I formatted it for him and reinstalled everything though and he’s been good ever since.

That’s nothing! Spysheriff says I have 1,678. Thank god I’m having it remove them now. :awesome:

Read full topic

item.title: so i was helping my friend clean her computer
item.dc:creator: Xilarating
item.description:
Maxey:

Let me guess. You’re a girl.

oh, i thought they were just being a jerk lol. shrug

Bad D0g:

Does she use Facebook a lot? My mom plays FarmVille all the time (don’t ask) and i noticed that the Facebook games leave fuckloads of temp files that slow the shit out of everything

indeed she does

also, i’ve found zero compromising pictures
i don’t think i would post them anyway, i wouldn’t wanna be “that guy” lol

Read full topic

item.title: so i was helping my friend clean her computer
item.dc:creator: Marb
item.description:
So… how many “compromising” pictures of her have you found on her drive? Don’t get me wrong, I’m not saying you should post them or anything (especially if you have even an ounce of respect for her), I’m just sort of curious if you’ve “stumbled across” anything unusual or funny?

On topic… crap, I just checked my own pc and I guess I’ve been lazy since mine looks almost as bad as hers
